Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima glared at Rodimus, her crimson optics nearly glowing. Wishing so 
desperatedly to backfire on him. But she won't. This chat was putting her desires 
of the Ark in jeopardy. But, she had her own honor which she will not by any 
means sacrifice. 

The thought of Blackstorm no longer around was nearly sickening & rather 
depressing. Again, she had formed a sort of bond with the fembot. As though they 
were sisters, they were comrades. & to have Rodimus once again take that bond & 
rip it apart was ripping her apart. 

Now she knew how Rodimus felt. & Hopefully, how Rodimus understood how she 
felt. For once, he was feeling her pain. & his threats will not go unanswered. 
She will defend her comrades to the demise if need be. Just as she had in the 
past. 

Not caring suddenly what Hydras may growl at her or reprimand upon her.. she 
stepped forward, leaning to the screen. Her crimson optics deathly evil & 
haunting. "Now you know how I feel, Rodimus. What goes around, comes around." her 
voice reflected her haunting look in her optics. 

--part1_75.1396fc8f.2c22803f_boundary
